name: site
description: name of the site of the experiment

name: subsite
description: name of the sub-site of the experiment

name: trial_id
description: identifier of a single trial (that may have treatments and replicates); should be unique witin dataset_id

name: start_date
description: experiment start (planting) date in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format

name: end_date
description: experiment end (harvest) date in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format

name: on_farm
description: is this observation on farm (not on station)

name: is_survey
description: is this observation from a survey (not an experiment)

name: crop
vocabulary: See crops table. Use ; to separate multiple crops

name: observation_date
vocabulary: For experiments with, e.g. intermediate crop cuts; or for surveys

name: yield
description: dry-weight biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity
vocabulary: if necessary computed from fresh weight. If necessary, assume standard moisture content. See crops	 table

name: P_fertilizer
description: P fertilizer applied (as P, not P2O5)

name: K_fertilizer
description: K fertilizer applied (as K, not K2O)

name: soil_ph
description: soil ph of the experimental unit
